name: Fiction
description: Books that are created from the imagination of the author.

name: Non-fiction
description: Books based on real-life events, facts, and information.

name: Fantasy
description: Books that involve magic, mythical creatures, and imaginary worlds.

name: Thriller
description: Books that create intense excitement, suspense, and anticipation.

name: Young
description: Books aimed at teenage readers, typically featuring young protagonists.

name: Science
description: Books that explore scientific concepts, theories, and discoveries.

name: Horror
description: Books that evoke a sense of fear, dread, and terror in readers.

name: Historical Fiction
description: Books that are set in the past and incorporate fictional elements.

name: Victorian Era
description: Books that are set during the reign of Queen Victoria in the 19th century.

name: Poetry
description: Books that use language to evoke emotions and express ideas artistically.

name: Business
description: Books that provide insights and strategies for the world of commerce.

name: Marketing
description: Books that explore various marketing strategies and tactics.

name: Memory
description: Books that recount personal experiences and memories of the author.

name: Emotional
description: Books that delve into the author's emotional journey and personal growth.
